{{section-equipment}}


This piece of Equipment was designed to combat the effects of different military concealment and camouflage technologies. 

{{skillbox |black| MULTISPECTRAL VISOR LEVEL 1 | AUTOMATIC EQUIPMENT }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory }}
{{effects}}
{{c1}}
* This Visor reduces the [[MOD]] of [[Mimetism]] (-3) from -3 to 0.
* It also reduces the [[MOD]] of [[Mimetism]] (-6) from -6 to -3.
{{c1end}}{{n4list}}
* This Visor reduces the MODs of [[Mimetism]] (-3), and of [[Low Visibility Zone]]s, to 0. 
* This Visor reduces the MODs of [[Mimetism]] (-6), and of [[Poor Visibility Zone]]s, to -3.
* Additionally, it allows the user to draw [[LoF]] through [[Zero Visibility Zone]]s, applying a -6 MOD to any Skill that requires LoF. {{seefaq | Sixth Sense and Multispectral Visor L1.}}
* Troopers equipped with this piece of Equipment do not make Face to Face Rolls against weapons using [[Smoke Ammunition]].
{{n4end}}


{{skillbox |black| MULTISPECTRAL VISOR LEVEL 2 | AUTOMATIC EQUIPMENT }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory }}
{{effects}}
{{c1}}
* Reduces [[Mimetism]]-imposed [[MODs]] to 0.
{{c1end}}{{n4list}}
* Reduces MODs from [[Mimetism]], and from [[Visibility Zone]]s, to 0.
* Additionally, it allows the user to draw [[LoF]] through [[Zero Visibility Zone]]s.
* Troopers equipped with this piece of Equipment do not make Face to Face Rolls against weapons using [[Smoke Ammunition]].
{{n4end}}


{{skillbox |black| MULTISPECTRAL VISOR LEVEL 3 | AUTOMATIC EQUIPMENT }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory }}
{{effects}}
{{c1}}
* Reduces [[Mimetism]]-imposed [[MODs]] to 0.
{{c1end}}{{n4list}}
* Reduces MODs from [[Mimetism]], and from [[Visibility Zone]]s, to 0.
* Additionally, it allows the user to draw [[LoF]] through [[Zero Visibility Zone]]s.
* Troopers equipped with this piece of Equipment do not make Face to Face Rolls against weapons using [[Smoke Ammunition]].
{{n4end}}
* When declaring [[Discover]] against a target in the Camouflaged State, the user of this piece of Equipment automatically passes, without need for a Roll, any necessary [[WIP]] Rolls against that target. 
* Users of a Multispectral Visor L3 ignore [[Surprise Attack]] [[MODs]] if they have [[LoF]] to the attacker. In addition, they also ignore [[Surprise Attack]] [[MODs]] from [[CC Attacks]] even if they don't have [[LoF]] to the attacker.
